fields.name: Aloe Vera
fields.description: The Aloe Vera houseplant originates from Africa. It has long luscious leaves and is spongy to the touch. Each leaf is full of aloe gel. This soothing gel has many health benefits. Today, aloe gel is used for many skin conditions with fantastic results.

fields.name: Golden Pothos
fields.description: The Devil's Ivy has magnificent leaves will grow quickly and youâ€™ll have long, luscious and draping vines in no time at all.

fields.name: Spider Plant
fields.description: A well-known houseplant, the Spider plant can be found naturally in the South Pacific and South Africa. With the right care the Spider Plant will produce small flowers that eventually turn into Spider Plant babies!

fields.name: Boston Fern
fields.description: The Boston Fern is the easiest of the fern family to care for and look absolutely stunning. They are sure to transform any space. In their pot or hanging in a trendy plant hanger, ferns are all the rage but do need specific care. High humidity is key and make sure you don't let the soil dry out - they won't thank you for it!

fields.name: Bird of Paradise
fields.description: This plant is a native to South Africa, a real talking point it has large exotic looking paddle shaped leaves on long elegant stems. The leaves are a gorgeous glossy dark green colour. All Strelitzia will have some splits in their leaves, this is a clever trick the plant does to ensure that the younger leaves receive plenty of light. You will particularly notice this on the mature leaves and is a part of the natural charm of this plant. This is a relatively low maintenance houseplant that offers a big impact.

fields.name: Peace Lily
fields.description: The Peace Lily has gorgeous broad, lance-shaped dark green leaves and a unique white flowers which sit on long stalks. The 'flowers' are actually leaf bracts that form as the white blooms, making it a unique and highly interesting plant which has proven to be one of our most popular items.
